comments:
I'm using the profiler plugin (ru.nlmk.eclipse.plugins.profiler). Opening a new Launch Configuation via Run|Debug...|Profiler|New without an opend Editor or selected resource I get the following error. 

Afterwards I can't use the Launch Dialog, it simple does not show anything else than the tree on the left and, after reopeing the dialog (and maybe clicking on the newly created configuration) and ok-ing the error message (Log again the same...), the offending configuration with only a generic name fileld in. 

Deleting the configuartion is tricky, you have to delete the config after pressing 'close' you will be asked, if you want to save the 'unsaved New Configuartion'. saying no to the 'save?' Question just doen't do anything but showing an error and in the log is again the following exception.  

I will send a bugreport to the author of the plugin as well, but IMO the launch Dialog should still be useable after such an error.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.jface 4 2 Feb 20, 2003 17:54:09.219

handling errors in the LCD has changed substantially since 2.1, this problem is no long producable

traces.message: Path for project must have only one segment.
